import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const BookShelf = ({Shelf, handleMoveToShelf}) => { const [books , setBooks] = useState(['loading...']); const handleMoving = (e, book) =>{ const Book = book; const shelf = e.target.value; console.log(Book.title, shelf) handleMoveToShelf(Book, shelf) }; useEffect(() => { setBooks([...Shelf]) }, [books]) return (

MyReads

Currently Reading

    { books[0] === 'loading...' || books[0] === '' ?

    loading...

    : books.map((book) => { if(book.shelf === 'currentlyReading'){ return(
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ) } }) }

Want to Read

    { books[0] === 'loading...' || books[0] === '' ?

    loading...

    : books.map((book) => { if(book.shelf === 'wantToRead'){ return(
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ) } }) }

Read

    { books[0] === 'loading...' || books[0] === '' ?

    loading...

    : books.map((book) => { if(book.shelf === 'read'){ return(
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ) } }) }
Add a book
); }; export default BookShelf;
